speaker: Barkeep
lines: The barkeep wipes the counter in slow circles.
He sets down a clean glass.
'You look like a question,' he says. 'Pick one.'
He taps the bar and nods toward the cellar door.
The mirror shows the room over your shoulder.
A ledger lies open beside a stack of mugs.
Barrels line the wall by the rear.
The tap hisses; the cask is fresh.
